#include<stdio.h>
//#include<iostream>
//#define g getchar_unlocked
int b[1003],i=0;
void in()
 {int n=0;
  char a;
  a=getchar();
  while(a>='0'&&a<='9')
  {
   b[i++]=(a-'0');
   a=getchar();
   }
 } 
int main()
{
    int t,a[1004],j,r;
    int f;
    scanf("%d\n",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              i=0;
              in();
              r=0;
             for(j=0;j<i;j++)
             {             
                              r=r*10+b[j];
                              if(r>=17)
                              r=r%17;
             }
             if(r==0)
             printf("YES\n");
             else
             printf("NO\n");
             
              
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
